data.prayer: Jesus, defend your people in the state of Udmurt against the difficulty of these last days.
data.verse: But mark this: There will be terrible times in the last days. 2 People will be lovers of themselves, lovers of money, boastful, proud, abusive, disobedient to their parents, ungrateful, unholy, 3 without love, unforgiving, slanderous, without self-control, brutal, not lovers of the good, 4 treacherous, rash, conceited, lovers of pleasure rather than lovers of God— 5 having a form of godliness but denying its power.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Udmurt, Russia

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Udmurt words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 68 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, your Word is essential for life and growth. Please challenge the 871,615 cultural Christians in the state of Udmurt to read your Word for themselves today.
data.verse: It is written: 'Man shall not live by bread alone, but by every word that comes from the mouth of God.'

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Udmurt
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Tabasaran people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Udmurt, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

data.prayer: Father, help the 22,726 believers in Udmurt to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.section_summary:
the state of Udmurt, Russia has a population of 1,552,900.

We estimate Udmurt has 22,726 people who might know Jesus, 871,615 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 658,559 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 68 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, we ask for networks of simple churches in every city in the state of Udmurt, like Paul planted in Corinth and Ephesus.
data.verse: The churches in the province of Asia send you greetings. Aquila and Priscilla greet you warmly in the Lord, and so does the church that meets at their house.
